snippet.title: Rise of Kingdoms Trailer
snippet.description:
Rise of Kingdoms is a mobile MMO real-time epic strategy game inspired by history.

Get it on Google Play ► https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lilithgame.roc.gp

Get it on the App Store ► https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1354260888

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/riseofkingdomsgame/

In Rise of Kingdoms, you’ll find a seamless and highly detailed world map, with 11 civilizations and more than 20 historical heroes to choose from. Each has specialty troops and buildings with unique upgrades. You’ll also research technologies from various eras, join alliances, and manage the growth of your cities.

Lead your civilization to glory!
